Description.Name: Bribe Local Officials
Description.Details: Where there are officials, there are corrupt officials. Pay a hefty bribe to raise your standing with this star system's owner. Raises faction reputation by 15 up to a max of 20, effective at the end of the next day. Item will be removed automatically after reputation change. This item will not work for Clans. Waste your money if you want, but you've been warned.
